titles: Ane premonitioun to the barnis of Leith
author: Sempill, Robert, 1530?-1595.
notes: Attributed to Robert Sempill by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, and with broken type, with loss of text; bracketed date in imprint suggested by STC 2nd ed.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
